review: I went to the doctor with intense pain in my upper premolar. He diagnosed the issue quickly and recommended RCT. He started treatment and my pain was almost gone within an hour. I needed 4 sittings and except on the third sitting (when I felt some pain) it was a smooth procedure.Finally, one word of praise for the gentleman who mans the Reception. He is one of the most polite and friendly people I have met in my life.Thank you.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had tooth cavity which degraded and lead to tooth decay. The gum swelled and there was polyp formation. Doctor Muhury explained my condition to me in details with patience. I underwent X ray examination  immediately and then he concluded I was in the need of RCT and crown placement. It took 4 appointments for the entire procedure while he compassionately ensured that I feel the least amount of pain. I am thankful to doctor S. Muhury😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** * **** ******* * ** ******** pretty much friendly, technically sound n most importantly explains everything with lot of patience....responds quickly to calls n msgs... my molar tooth got extracted with minimal pain...Bridge n crown fixing was a real smooth process Absolute 5 star....

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: The whole clinic and it’s procedure room was very hygienic with nice ambiance. Doctor patiently and attentively listened my problems. Promptly examined my denture, explained the status of my tenth and options available for the treatment. During the treatment he followed the procedure very professionally and coolly. Didn’t get pain during or after the treatment procedures. After my first seating was over he again explained the status and fixed my next appointment. As everything was pleasant I was very happy. Looking forward for next appointment. -:Purabi Dev Roy.
